Class RIOTester

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib.Node
      RIONode
          RIOTester

public class RIOTester
extends RIONode

Class that tests the reliable, in-order message layer. Randomly sends messages to other nodes and receives them in order from the RIO layer. This continues until we send at least 100 messages to another node.
